00054         flags |= wxTAB_HITTEST_ONICON;
00055     if ((hitTestInfo.flags & TCHT_ONITEMLABEL) == TCHT_ONITEMLABEL)
00056         flags |= wxTAB_HITTEST_ONLABEL;
00057

00059 }

00072 void ChameleonNotebook::OnTabActivate (wxMouseEvent &event) 
00073 {
00074     wxPoint pt;
00075     pt.x = event.GetX();
00076     pt.y = event.GetY();
00077 
00078     long flags = 0;
00079     int pageNum = this->HitTest (pt, &flags);
00080     if (pageNum < 0)
00081     {
00082         return;
00083     }
00084 
00085     m_parent->SetIntVar(VN_CLICKEDTAB, pageNum);
00086     wxMenu popupMenu;
00087     popupMenu.Append(ID_CLOSETAB, "Close");
00088     PopupMenu(&popupMenu, pt);
00089 }

00133 void ChameleonNotebook::OnSize(wxSizeEvent &event)
00134 {
00135     event.Skip();
00136 }
00137 
00148 int ChameleonNotebook::FindPagePosition(wxNotebookPage* page)
00149 {
00150     int nPageCount = GetPageCount();
00151     int nPage;
00152     for ( nPage = 0; nPage < nPageCount; nPage++ )
00153         if (GetPage(nPage) == page)
00154             return nPage;
00155     return -1;
00156 }
